display_long_description:
Animal Company is a FREE multiplayer social VR survival game on Meta Quest, where monsters, gadgets, and chaos with friends collide. With weekly updates, there’s always something new to explore, unlock, or break.

[media]

# Why Players Love Animal Company:

🔫 Co-Op Survival & Monster Fights: 
Team up with friends to explore haunted forests, secret research labs, icy mountain slopes, abandoned mines, low-gravity nuclear zones, lava caves, and frozen lakes — all controlled by the mysterious Canopy Group. You can play in random public servers or private servers.

🛝 Physics Toys, Tech Gadgets & Loot:
Unlock powerful gadgets, sandbox toys, and rare loot. Craft and trade weapons, vehicles, drones, and robots, then level up using a deep Tech Tree that unlocks new abilities.

[media]

😎 Custom Animals & Skins:
Create your own animal character with unique body parts and drip fashion. Limited-time outfits and characters drop every two weeks.

[media]

📸 Meme-able & Stream-Ready Social Chaos
Scream, panic, or whisper using proximity chat and walkie-talkies while monsters hunt you down. Turn every game session into funny clips and short movies, or run your own mini-games, tournaments, or music concerts with friends to go viral on TikTok and YouTube.

[media]

👉 Join millions of players
Animal Company has one of the largest Discord communities in social VR, with on-going contests, quests, giveaways, developer events, and creator programs.

[media]

Play Animal Company for FREE on Meta Quest today and experience nonstop social chaos with friends.
